definition: a vessel in which cream is agitated to separate butterfat from buttermilk, to stir cream vigorously in order to make butter
details:
noun
- a vessel in which cream is agitated to separate butterfat from buttermilk
= example: a vessel in which cream is agitated to separate butterfat from buttermilk
= synonyms: butter churn
- the processing a series of things
= example: the processing a series of things
verb
- to stir cream vigorously in order to make butter
= example: to stir cream vigorously in order to make butter
- to be agitated
= example: to be agitated
= synonyms: boil, moil, roil
